feed.title: Great Ouse Ways
feed.subtitle: A guide to exploring the Great Ouse

entry.title: Ouse Valley Way Marathon
entry.content:
The annual Ouse Valley Way Marathon and Half Marathon will be on 21st September 2025 organised by the BRJ Run and Tri club.

The scenic route follows the Ouse Valley from Earith to Eynesbury, running along and near to the river on a mix of grass, gravel and tarmac paths.

BRJ details
entry.summary: The annual Ouse Valley Way Marathon and Half Marathon will be on 21st September 2025 organised by the BRJ Run and Tri club.
